1.label: Ammunition misfires
1.desc: On the lowest floor of the naval battery

2.label: Security measures
2.desc: Below a desk, on the ground

1.label: Field bottle
1.desc: On a table right next to the window

2.label: Stone Eagle
2.desc: Close to the sniper on the ruin

1.label: Destroy the Naval Battery
1.desc.1: Option A - Obtain the scuttle code. (1/2) (Carried by the Officer)
1.desc.2: Option A - Obtain the scuttle code. (2/2) (In the safe, combination carried by Officer Oswald Becker nearby)
1.desc.3: Option A - Send the scuttle code.
1.desc.4: Option B - Sabotage the artillery rounds (1/2)
1.desc.5: Option B - Sabotage the artillery rounds (2/2)

desc.1: Option A - Activate the crane control panel.
desc.2: Option B - Sabotage the refueling system.

1.label: Dead Mans Bay
1.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

2.label: Destroyed Reef
2.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

3.label: Southern Ridge
3.desc: Recon planes suggest this as a suitable infiltration point for this mission.

4.label: Intel about scuttle code for primary mission

5.label: Map of anti-aircraft guns
5.desc: On the wall. Reveals the locations for the secondary objective.

1.label: Poison
1.desc: On a shelf in the storage room.

2.label: Cup
2.desc: On the upper floor. Can be poisoned with @link[special.1]. Ring the bell next to it after poisoning.

3.label: Planks
3.desc: On the outside wall. Covert way inside.
